曃字的基本解释

曃
dài
〔暧（
刬 ）曃〕昏暗。

曃字的汉语字典释义

[①]［dài］
［《廣韻》他代切，去代，透。］
见“曖曃”。

曃字的康熙字典解释

【辰集上】【日字部】　曃； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页500第07
【廣韻】【集韻】?他代切，音態。暖曃，不明貌。【楚辭·遠遊】旹曖曃其曭莽兮。【註】日月晻黮而無光也。　又【集韻】【韻會】徒戴切【正韻】度耐切，?音代。義同。

曃字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
曃字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［dài］
["Guang Yun" he cuts on his behalf, goes on behalf of, and thoroughly. ]
See "暧曃".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji 1] [Japanese Character Department] 　曃; Kangxi strokes: 16; Page number: page 500 to 07
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? He cuts on behalf of him, his voice state. Warm, unclear appearance. [Songs of the Chu·Farward Tour] It's silly and reckless. [Note] The sun and the moon are dark but not light.　[Jiyun] [Yunhui] Tu Daiqie [Zhengyun] Tolerance and cutting,? Sound generation. The same meaning.
